props.name: links
props.docblock: an array of objects with the properties `label` and `url` as strings.

description.text: an array of objects with the properties `label` and `url` as strings.

props.name: activeLabel
props.docblock:
allows to add a label that is not a link to the end of the breadcrumb.
Defaults to `undefined`.

description.text:
allows to add a label that is not a link to the end of the breadcrumb.
Defaults to `undefined`.

props.name: spacer
props.docblock:
allows to add a custom element between the breadcrumb items.
Defaults to `>` rendered using the `Icon` component.

description.text:
allows to add a custom element between the breadcrumb items.
Defaults to `>` rendered using the `Icon` component.

props.name: clickHandler
props.docblock:
allows to add a custom function to be called `onClick` of a breadcrumb link.
The use case for this is for adding custom analytics to the component.

description.text:
allows to add a custom function to be called `onClick` of a breadcrumb link.
The use case for this is for adding custom analytics to the component.
